textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Theory is more than a company, it's a concept, a philosophy, an aesthetic, and a style. The people behind Theory are a band of aesthetic insiders who love luxury and simplicity. And, of course, Theory is all about the fit and the fabrics and feeling sexy and confident. Passion drives Theory to constantly evolve, and passionate is how people feel in its clothes and about its clothes. In Theory, anything is possible.
